entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
